ygData.subject: RE:  Anyone noticed this.. (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: I know others who were having similar problems, but it has been amazingly NON- crashy for me. (Usually I crash at least once a night.Nada since the pack) I
ygData.messageBody:
I know others who were having similar problems, but it has been amazingly
NON-
crashy for me. (Usually I crash at least once a night.Nada since the pack)

I think the RNG finally found your number, that's all.

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Michal Hobson [mailto:given@...]
>Sent: Monday, February 07, 2000 7:48 AM
>To: EQBards
>Subject: [EQBards] Anyone noticed this.. (OT)
>
>
>From: "Michal Hobson" <given@...>
>
> Has anyone else noticed anything screwy since the last patch?
>I'm not talking songs being out of whack or anything to that
>effect. I had only had one crash to the desktop in the whole time
>I've been playing. Since the last patch, I've locked up on the
>login screen 5 times and crashed completely twice -- each one
>requiring a reboot. I haven't installed anything since then or
>even prior to the patch so I was just seeing if anyone else was
>experiencing the same sort of thing.
>
> On the other hand though, the random number generator seems to
>have taken a liking to me last night. I was camping the goblin
>foreman in SolA for some quick cash. We were there 2 hours and
>the foreman (20 min spawn) spawned 4 out of the six times we were
>there. Every time he had an obsidian scimitar! 6 spawns, 4
>foremen, 4 OS's -- too bad we had a druid with us that was in dire
>need of a tunic.....but I'm not complaining =)
>
>Weiland
>Erollisi Marr
><Disciples of Truth>
>
>
>[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
